name: Dulce de Leche Pudding
description: Dulce de Leche is a decadent caramelized milk popular in Latin America. Made into a pudding, it’s a fancier version of caramel or butterscotch pudding. For an instant upgrade, add a little sea salt overtop for a sweet ‘n salty combination that will make you swoon.  Avoiding dairy? The blend is dairy-free, choose your favourite plant-based milk to keep it vegan.

ingredients.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix

preparation: In a large bowl, whisk pudding mix with milk for 2 min, until light and airy.
Cover and refrigerate at least 10 min, or until chilled. Stir before serving.
tips: While whisking, stir in 1⁄4 cup mascarpone cheese for a richer-tasting pudding.

products.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Rich, creamy, and dreamy! It makes a pudding in minutes – so you can enjoy it anytime you’re looking for a quick, sweet treat – and is versatile enough to make bread puddings, energy balls, caramelized carrots, and more!
